vote.title: Authorize a service agreement with Schneider Electric Buildings Americas Inc. for on-site and remote monitoring, analysis, and support of building operating systems to improve and reduce energy and operating costs at City facilities procured through The Interlocal Purchasing System Contract No. 19060401 - Not to exceed $879,439.00 - Financing: General Fund ($232,000.00) and U.S. Department of Treasury - Coronavirus Relief Fund ($106,127.00) and Capital Construction Fund ($541,312.00)
